mnwpIgsY5Yjh21QDZ.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
mnwpIgsY5Yjh21QDZ.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

ma9YBDQT4e0HP4zA8.name: Oxygen Storage
ma9YBDQT4e0HP4zA8.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

m5zzaaQohB_D3wrjY.name: Oxygen Storage
m5zzaaQohB_D3wrjY.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

ml4BQYmEKMlNdJG6S.name: Oxygen Storage
ml4BQYmEKMlNdJG6S.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

m7zu7I-xu8IxKxV3a.name: Oxygen Storage
m7zu7I-xu8IxKxV3a.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

maYlRh8bxC0HiQNTR.name: Oxygen Storage
maYlRh8bxC0HiQNTR.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

tOQPH6CARXdE-BnAa.name: High Pain Threshold
tOQPH6CARXdE-BnAa.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

mvhCgdDEGXWOYqKO7.name: Diffuse
mvhCgdDEGXWOYqKO7.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mwpOd1LvU6Lfhqj_V.name: Homogenous
mwpOd1LvU6Lfhqj_V.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mDAy5u_jwlppSBaf2.name: No Blood
mDAy5u_jwlppSBaf2.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mRqoZgGmW7GdngpJg.name: No Brain
mRqoZgGmW7GdngpJg.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mPCZDy_BIwY45wRK_.name: No Eyes
mPCZDy_BIwY45wRK_.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mkN0HziG4AfcJ-M1V.name: No Head
mkN0HziG4AfcJ-M1V.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mwwfVinhsVYOd58Af.name: No Neck
mwwfVinhsVYOd58Af.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mXzJ7q_V9bOoHnDFF.name: No Vitals
mXzJ7q_V9bOoHnDFF.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mGtCLaduIvAMwTmC4.name: Unliving
mGtCLaduIvAMwTmC4.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
